name: PAT_ENC_CALL_PRTLS
description: This table lists the Protocols (LPT records) used in clinical calls.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the patient call protocols.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the protocol used during the call.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_ID_PROTOCOL_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the protocol.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_CONTACT
columns.description: The contact of the protocol used.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: PROTOCOL_USED_YN
columns.description: Specifies whether the protocol was used or simply viewed during the encounter.  If the protocol was actually used, this item will be set to yes.
